mapper.select: select * from corona_info where stateTime >= str_to_date(#{date}, "%Y-%m-%d") LIMIT 1
select * from corona_sido where date_format(createDt, "%Y-%m-%d") = str_to_date(#{date}, "%Y-%m-%d") and gubun != '합계'
select * from corona_age where gubun != '여성' and gubun != '남성' and date_format(createDt, "%Y-%m-%d") = str_to_date(#{date}, "%Y-%m-%d")

select * , case when sido = '서울특별시' then '서울' when sido = '부산광역시' then '부산' when sido = '대구광역시' then '대구' when sido = '인천광역시' then '인천' when sido = '광주광역시' then '광주' when sido = '대전광역시' then '대전' when sido = '울산광역시' then '울산' when sido = '세종특별자치시' then '세종' when sido = '경기도' then '경기' when sido = '강원도' then '강원' when sido = '충청북도' then '충북' when sido = '충청남도' then '충남' when sido = '전라북도' then '전북' when sido = '전라남도' then '전남' when sido = '경상북도' then '경북' when sido = '경상남도' then '경남' when sido = '제주특별자치도' then '제주' end as region from corona_vaccine where date_format(regDt, '%Y-%m-%d') = str_to_date('2021-08-12', '%Y-%m-%d') and sido != '전국' and sido !='기타'
